definitions: secured in the possession of or assigned to a person

examples.text: a state law vested the ownership of all wild birds to the individual counties

shortDefinitions: secured in possession of or assigned to person

definitions: protected or established by law or contract

examples.text: parental rights are then vested by section 14 of the 1975 Act

shortDefinitions: protected or established by law or contract

definitions: (of a person) legally entitled to a future benefit, as from a pension

examples.text: he was completely vested after five years with the company

shortDefinitions: legally entitled to future benefit, as from pension

definitions: supplied or worn with a vest.
